description.en:
Ji Kang Hyeok, a well-known actor known as an actor who has a lot of scandal. Yoo Je-Ah, a beautiful actress who is famous for her good image and has never been involved in a scandal. However, there was big news when they decided to get married. Marriage that is not based on love. How does their story continue...?

---

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Terjebak-Pernikahan-Palsu/3268)

---

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51761535)
description.id:
Ji Kang Hyeok, aktor ternama yang dikenal sebagai aktor yang punya banyak skandal. Yoo Je-Ah, seorang aktris cantik yang terkenal dengan imejnya yang baik dan tidak pernah terlibat skandal.Namun terjadi berita besar ketika mereka memutuskan akan menikah. Pernikahan yang tidak dilandasi oleh cinta. Bagaimana kelanjutan kisah mereka...?

---

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Terjebak-Pernikahan-Palsu/3268)

---

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51761535)
description.ko:
견원지간 톱스타끼리의 아슬아슬한 밀당 로맨스
가시 돋친 둘의 감정은 발전할 수 있을까?

사고뭉치로 유명한 배우 지강혁과 톱스타 유제아의 상상도 못한 결혼발표에 세간의 이목이 집중된다. 
사고뭉치 배우 지강혁과 톱스타 유제아, 그들이 선택한 결혼은?

---

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Terjebak-Pernikahan-Palsu/3268)

---

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51761535)
